comments.body: This is a good initiative by hugeblack. comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: I got a notification about this thread earlier when it was created, checked on it a few minutes ago, and I noticed a lot of our S/brothers have made reports of their posts in there, which is a good thing that we are to use the opportunity wisely. I don't have much time this period, if not even as I'm not that always active on this one local board, I can still figure out a few quality posts that lack merit and could have done justice by reporting them for merit.For those who have already submitted an application and the number of posts is not up to the 10 maximum required limit, it will also go a long way if you can still add posts of other members that you think are worth meriting, as not everyone will have the privilege of coming across the thread and doing a self-report. So IMO, it will be nice if we can also add the posts of others from our local board here.
